attributes.action: IMMEDIATELY AND PERMANENTLY REMOVE FROM THE HOUSE OF LORDS THOSE MEMBERS WHO WALKED OUT DURING TRIBUTES TO DEAD SOLDIERS.
attributes.additional_details:
So there is no confusion, what we want you to do is in upper case lettering.  You seem, so often, to be able to identify what it is we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

This was a shameful demonstration of the disdain in which these people hold our armed forces - which they send to foreign parts to be killed.  These people have no nobility nor probity and MUST be forever removed from the House of Lords and have ANY titles bestowed upon them in the name of the people they so obviously have the greatest disregard for, removed. Greater hatred hath no man (or woman) than he who can walk out during tributes to members of our armed forces who THEY approved sending to be killed.  GET THEM OUT AND KEEP THEM OUT.
